Intro to Raspberry Pi Camp

When: July 18-22 2022, 2:00-5:00 PM

Where: Asheville Math, Asheville NC

A summer camp where students will learn about the Raspberry Pi computer, Linux, and coding with Python. We'll use code to create games, build websites, compose music, and control electronics!

What are we going to do at the camp?

Have Fun

This is a summer camp! We have to have fun!

Learn

Don't waste your time playing video games, learn to make your own games! And more!

What is the Raspberry Pi?

The Raspberry Pi is a credit card sized computer designed to help students learn computer science.

Let's look at some of the things we can do with the Raspberry Pi below!

 name = input("Please enter your name: ")
print(f"Hello {name}")

Code with Python

Python is a great first programming language to learn. It's easy to start coding right away.

Hook up a Raspberry Pi to a breadboard and prototype your own electronic gadgets!

  • Control LEDs
  • Intruder detector
  • Electronic games

Use code to create music with Sonic Pi!

We'll use Sonic Pi to create our own music with code. Listen to some of the features of Sonic Pi straight from their website:

  • Sonic Pi is a code-based music creation and performance tool.
  • Simple enough for computing and music lessons.
  • Powerful enough for professional musicians.
  • Diverse community of over 1.8 million live coders.
  • Learn to code creatively by composing or performing music in an incredible range of styles from Classical & Jazz to Grime & EDM.
